subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Japanese bush warbler}} [[File:Cettia_diphone.jpg|thumb|250px|{{m|ja|鶯|tr=uguisu}}: a '''[[Japanese bush warbler]]''' in its [[characteristic]] [[olive]]-[[green]] [[color]].]]
{{ja-kanjitab|うぐいす|yomi=k}} {{IPAfont|⟨uɡupi1 su⟩}} → {{IPAchar|/uɡupisu/}} → {{IPAchar|/uɡufisu/}} → {{IPAchar|/uɡuwisu/}} → {{IPAchar|/uɡuisu/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=うぐいす|-}}. Compound of {{com|ja|sort=うぐいす|うぐい|tr1=ugui|pos1=onomatopoeia, imitative of the bird's call|す|tr2=su|t2=bird|pos2=ancient suffix appearing in certain bird names, possibly cognate with {{cog|ko|새||bird}}}}.{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}} Compare the {{m|ja|す|tr=su}} in {{m|ja|烏|tr=karasu}}, {{m|ja|杜鵑|tr=hototogisu}}, {{m|ja|モズ|tr=mozu}}.
